name: XorCraft
description:
Minecraft, but it was made in 24  hours with GameMaker Studio 2.
How'd I do?

Open the "settings.txt" file to change the settings! Disable AO if the chunk generation is too slow!

Challenge: Collect 3 Rubys and 1 Saphire block! They're very rare

Features:

  • Fully dynamic voxel chunk system
  • A basic inventory
  • Block  Ambient Occlusion and shadows
  • Configurable settings (disable AO if it's too slow)
  • Volumetric clouds
